g.font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic"

text.font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic"
text.tspan: LifeSaver isn't much of a game, it's really more of an
interactive film. That doesn't deduct from it's important
messages, though, as LifeSaver puts you in a number
of situations (such as an elderly person having Cardiac
Arrest) and tasks you with doing the right thing. Picking
the wrong thing to do in a situation allows you to see
the concequence of your mistake, and over time teaches
you how to save a life in anumber of situations
